name: hal
description: A development environment for the web. Basically a wrapper around webpack, babel and postcss.

scripts.precommit: prettier --single-quote --bracket-spacing true --trailing-comma none --write "src/**/*.js" && npm test && pjv package.json

author: Samir Alajmovic <alajmovic.samir@gmail.com> (https://www.alajmovic.com)
